title: Who are the present-day Ammonites and Moabites, descendants of the biblical daughters of Lot, nephew of Abraham? - Quora

response.answer_text: Moabites were already gone as a separate nation by Nehemiah’s day (5th century BCE). Their area was overrun by Arabs, so it is possible that Moab dissolved into the Arab population. Jeremiah does promise that Moab will return at the end of days. Ammonites lasted much longer. They are mentioned as a numerous nation as late as second century CE. They lived in present-day Jordan. Then they disappeared from the historical record. We have no idea what happened to them. Perhaps they assimilated into the Roman culture.
Nobody knows who the descendents of the ancient Moabites and Ammonites are, because “Sennacherib mixed up the nations” after they were conquered by the old empires.
